title: Integral of final value given an initial value

content.prompt: The number of bacteria in a container increases at the rate of R(t) bacteria per hour. If there are 1000 bacteria at time t = 0, which of the following expressions gives the number of bacteria in the container at time t = 3 hours?

choices.label: ∫ 0 3 R ( t )   d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@431F@

1000+  ∫ 0 3 R ( t )   d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@431F@

topic.text: 8.3: Using Accumulation Functions and Definite Integrals in Applied Contexts

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
